subject: Re: [junit] About Ant Installation
msgSnippet: No need to install ant or Jdeveloper with Junit. Ant is java based buld tool.I think we can use it for make builds and packaged to jar files.The same build
messageBody:
No need to install ant or Jdeveloper with Junit.
Ant is java based buld tool.I think we can use it
for make builds and packaged to jar files.The same
build file can re use for making differnt bulds.
santhu.

--- anupama <anupama@...> wrote: >
> Hi,
>
> Is it essential to install Ant,JDeveloper along with
> junit.Can any one explain me the importance and
> usage of Ant and Jdeveloper.
>
> Anupama
